bridge-type.label: BlueGiga Bluetooth Dongle
bridge-type.description: Serial interface to the BlueGiga dongle

parameter.name: backgroundDiscovery
parameter.label: Background Discovery
parameter.description: Whether this adapter performs background discovery of Bluetooth devices

parameter.name: inactiveDeviceCleanupInterval
parameter.label: Device Cleanup Interval
parameter.description: How often device cleanup is performed

parameter.name: inactiveDeviceCleanupThreshold
parameter.label: Device Cleanup Threshold
parameter.description: Timespan a device can remain radio silent before it is eligible for cleanup

parameter.name: passiveScanIdleTime
parameter.label: Passive Scan Idle Time
parameter.description: Passive scan idle time defines the time how long to wait in milliseconds before start passive scan.

parameter.name: passiveScanInterval
parameter.label: Passive Scan Interval
parameter.description: Passive scan interval defines the interval when scanning is re-started in units of 625us. Default is 6400 units (4000ms).

parameter.name: passiveScanWindow
parameter.label: Passive Scan Window
parameter.description: Passive scan Window defines how long time the scanner will listen on a certain frequency and try to pick up advertisement packets. Default is 6400 units (4000ms).

parameter.name: activeScanInterval
parameter.label: Active Scan Interval
parameter.description: Active scan interval defines the interval when scanning is re-started in units of 625us. Default is 6400 units (4000ms).

parameter.name: activeScanWindow
parameter.label: Active Scan Window
parameter.description: Active scan Window defines how long time the scanner will listen on a certain frequency and try to pick up advertisement packets. Default is 6400 units (4000ms).

parameter.name: connIntervalMin
parameter.label: Minimum Connection Interval
parameter.description: Minimum connection interval in units of 1.25ms. Default is 80 units (100ms).

parameter.name: connIntervalMax
parameter.label: Maximum Connection Interval
parameter.description: Maximum connection interval in units of 1.25ms. Default is 800 units (1000ms).

parameter.name: connLatency
parameter.label: Connection Latency
parameter.description: Connection latency defines how many connection intervals a slave device can skip. Default is 3.

parameter.name: connTimeout
parameter.label: Connection Supervision Timeout
parameter.description: Connection supervision timeout in units of 10ms defines how long the devices can be out of range before the connection is closed. Default is 1000 units (10000ms).
